body_html: I think at some point we should deprecate out= functions that don't do NumPy-style broadcasting behavior. At least for reduction functions, that would prevent most torch.sum(x, 1, out=x) calls.
body_text: I think at some point we should deprecate out= functions that don't do NumPy-style broadcasting behavior. At least for reduction functions, that would prevent most torch.sum(x, 1, out=x) calls.
body: I think at some point we should deprecate `out=` functions that don't do NumPy-style broadcasting behavior. At least for reduction functions, that would prevent most `torch.sum(x, 1, out=x)` calls.
